TopicTitle: When is 1.1 being released is like.....

Articles.Content:
Watching the KSPTV streaming and many asking when is 1.1 being released...

to me, is like a kid in the back seat of a car asking "are we there yet?"

are we there yet? are we there yet? are we there yet? are we there yet? are we there yet? are we there yet? are we there yet? are we there yet? are we there yet? are we there yet? are we there yet? are we there yet? are we there yet? are we there yet? are we there yet? are we there yet? are we there yet? are we there yet? are we there yet? are we there yet? are we there yet? are we there yet? are we there yet? are we there yet? are we there yet? are we there yet? are we there yet? are we there yet? are we there yet? are we there yet? are we there yet? are we there yet? are we there yet? are we there yet? are we there yet? are we there yet? are we there yet? are we there yet? are we there yet? are we there yet? ....

Gets a bit boring after a time.... how many times does the host on the KSPTV have to say it..... "We have not been told"....

(sigh) but then, five minutes later.... they ask again...

 

Edited March 27, 2016 by kiwi1960
But when will it come out?

Soon™.

Also rule 2.3e:

Do not post messages that inquire about release dates for future versions of KSP.
